thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 8 of 718
thread.title: Becs
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Becs

author: Becs
title: Becs
text: Was great to be able to pick up from the airport rather than having to get a shuttle to and from a depot. Pick up took ages - as it seems to with all rental car pick ups - I really don't understand why it needs to take so long considering they know what flight you're arriving on. Irritating but is irritating with all rental car companies! Otherwise was a nice car, and no problems.
